name: convert mysql resultset to chardata
get data from box 1
func:
msg.topic="SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value as y, created_on as x "+ 
 "FROM iot_sensor_data d INNER JOIN iot_sensor s ON s.id=d.sensor_id "+
 " WHERE s.alias='"+msg.sensorAlias+"'"+
    " AND datediff(d.created_on, current_timestamp)>-1 "+
 "ORDER BY d.id DESC Limit "+msg.maxRecords+";"
 
/* 
msg.topic="select avg(sensor_value) as y, min(created_on), max(created_on) as x "+
    " from iot_sensor_data d"+
    " INNER JOIN iot_sensor s ON s.id=d.sensor_id "+
    " WHERE s.alias='"+msg.sensorAlias+"'"+
    " AND datediff(d.created_on, current_timestamp)>-1 "+
    " GROUP BY FLOOR(unix_timestamp(created_on)/(15*60));"; 
*/
return msg;

name: Zugangsdaten aus dem APRS flow entfernen

template:
#!/usr/bin/python

#Scriptname: aprs_wx

# Do not change this script in the filesystem.
# Do changes only in node-red

import socket
import sys
import os
import time

TCP_IP = 'cwop.aprs.net'
#TCP_IP = 'rotate.aprs2.net'
#TCP_PORT = 10152
TCP_PORT =  14580
BUFFER_SIZE = 1024

call = sys.argv[1]
passwd = sys.argv[2]
celsius = sys.argv[3]
#dest = "APZ100"
dest = "APRS"

fahrenheit = round( float (  float(celsius) * 1.8 + 32 ))
fahrenheit = int( float(fahrenheit)  )
print "Celsius:" + str(celsius)
print "Fahrenheit:" + str(fahrenheit)

s = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
s.connect((TCP_IP, TCP_PORT))
s.send ("user " + call + " pass " + passwd + "rn"+"\r\n")
data = s.recv(BUFFER_SIZE)
print data
time.sleep(2)

record=call + ">" + dest + ",TCPIP*:!5203.66N/01022.99E_.../...g...t0" + str(fahrenheit).zfill(2) + "r...p...P...h..b.....e1w\r\n"
print (record)

s.send (record)
data = s.recv(BUFFER_SIZE)
print data
